thread.title: Ground News - HK stocks beat 17,000 mark
thread.title_full: Ground News - HK stocks beat 17,000 mark

author: The Standard
title: Ground News - HK stocks beat 17,000 mark
text:
Summary by The Standard Staff reporter and agencies Hong Kong stocks rallied to above 17,000 points for the first time in nearly a month yesterday, though it was still down by 15 percent this year with only one trading day left. The Hang Seng Index jumped by 419 points, or 2.5 percent, to 17,043.5 yesterday, while the... Share menu More
